name: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ensure that employees and sub-contractors are using the most current and complete set of drawings
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: Contract Drawings and Registers
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed off
1.2 Implementation of all measures and controls
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All necessary measures and controls are being implemented, including: EMP, TMP, SWMS and WP
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: EMP, TMP, SWMS, WP
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Inspect delivered materials for any chips, cracks or other visible damage.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Line and level shall be set out according to design plans. Alignment of new seperation kerb and islands shall be marked out using string line.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed off

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Concrete/asphalt base shall be inspected to be free of foreign loose materials and water pooling. If required glue foam tape to the road where channel will be placed to ensure containment of adhesive.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Mix Orca Polurethane as follows:
– 2 parts of Part B Polyol Black
○ Using a paint stirer in a drill, stir for a minimum of 4 minutes.
○ Once Part A & B have been mixed, add 1:1 Part C Rubber Compound in the mixed A+B compound and stir again for 2 minutes. Ensure even mix throughout the adhesive.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Pour the Orca Polyurethane compound onto the road, spreading to a thickness of approximately 2mm.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed off
2.4 Placement and Securement of Orca Island
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Lay the island on the polyurethane material.
○ Drill holes through island fixing hole into road surface, then screw island down securely with 12mm x 150mm coach screws and mudguard washer. Ensure screws are all the way down to secure island.
○ Plastic plugs to be put in bolt holes.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed off
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the FH’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
